meanings.definition: A person or company that constructs buildings.
meanings.sent1: The builders worked hard to finish the new school on time.
meanings.sent2: The builders used bricks and cement to build the house.
meanings.sent3: The builders accidentally painted the door the wrong color, making it a funny sight.
meanings.sent4: The builders laid the foundation of trust in their community.
meanings.sent5: The builders' dedication to their craft was evident in every detail of the building.

meanings.definition: A substance or material used for constructing or repairing buildings.
meanings.sent1: The builders needed more wood to complete the project.
meanings.sent2: The builders purchased high-quality steel for the bridge construction.
meanings.sent3: The builders found a hidden stash of building materials in the old warehouse, much to their surprise.
meanings.sent4: The builders' creativity turned simple bricks into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The builders carefully selected the best materials for the job to ensure durability.
